wordpressPost.title: 2017-2018 Numeric Pedagogy Advisor in the West Indies
wordpressPost.content:
I was recruited by the academy of Guadeloupe (more than 60 middle and high schools) to :

  • Guide and animate a network of 15 middle-schools and high-schools to improve the integration of numeric tools in their pedagogy and functioning.
  • Participate to the strategical decisions making such as selecting applications that would suit teacher’s needs and elaborate a formation plan to diffuse the their usage.
